actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide an exemption from certain hazardous material transporation regulations for small cargo tank vehicles with a capacity of not more than 3,500 gallons that transport petroleum, and for other purposes.
short_title: Hazardous Materials Regulatory Relief Act of 1995

summary.text: Hazardous Materials Regulatory Relief Act of 1995 - Directs the Secretary of Transportation to exclude from any regulation pertaining to the maintenance, reconditioning, repair, inspection, or testing of packages, or any other function having an effect on the continuing qualification and use of packaging , any cargo tank vehicle of 3500 gallons or less used to transport petroleum products in intrastate or interstate transportation within 100 air miles of the principal place of business of the owner or lessee of the vehicle.

titles.title: Hazardous Materials Regulatory Relief Act of 1995

A bill to provide an exemption from certain hazardous material transporation regulations for small cargo tank vehicles with a capacity of not more than 3,500 gallons that transport petroleum, and for other purposes.
